entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:44 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 12:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
